Articles.Content: KW rocketry has not been updated for anything past .25. Should I be worried by this? Last time I tried using it was in .90 and the parts showed up in the loading screen, but not in the VAB. Same thing happens for 1.02. I am both confused and disappointed. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
This is not where it should be.
No, it has not been ditched. He is currently working on updating the entire mod. Be patient.
No, NovaPunch took a while to update and so will KWrocketry.

> 
> This is not where it should be.

This thread shouldn't exist at all. If the OP had just gone back 2 pages he would see that Kickasskyle posted that he would update it as soon as he finished with finals.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-10T00:40:49Z" title="05/10/2015 12:40  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 10, 2015</time> by sp1989**

> 
> This thread shouldn't exist at all. If the OP had just gone back 2 pages he would see that Kickasskyle posted that he would update it as soon as he finished with finals. So patience and due diligence are two things clearly lacking from the OP. [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/newreply.php?do=newreply&p=](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/newreply.php?do=newreply&p=)

Or simply bothered the read the KW Rocketry tread itself. [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51037-0-25-KW-Rocketry-v2-6d2-Available-0-25-Compatibility!-16-10-2014?p=1863858&viewfull=1#post1863858](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51037-0-25-KW-Rocketry-v2-6d2-Available-0-25-Compatibility!-16-10-2014?p=1863858&viewfull=1#post1863858)

Hi Super Scientist, welcome to the forums. 

As mentioned, you can find the add-on thread here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51037](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51037)

The criticism and bad attitude displayed here is usually a pretty small minority of users, so first let me say I'm sorry this gets to be your first experience, and secondly don't hesitate to bring questions when you have them.

I don't really care. Im a noob, what do I know about this.

- - - Updated - - -

I don't know if its just a glitch: even if I install the add-on correctly, all the parts show up on the loading screen and all the flags are there, but the parts don't show up in the VAB. I think this same problem was discussed somewhere else, but I don't remember. ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

> 
> I don't really care. Im a noob, what do I know about this.
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> I don't know if its just a glitch: even if I install the add-on correctly, all the parts show up on the loading screen and all the flags are there, but the parts don't show up in the VAB. I think this same problem was discussed somewhere else, but I don't remember. ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

The nodes in the tech tree are different now. The parts are telling the game they require a certain technology to be available, but the tech they are referencing doesn't exist anymore, so they don't show up.

Even if they did show, you probably wouldn't be able to get anything attached properly and the engines likely wouldn't function.

> 
> Hi Super Scientist, welcome to the forums. 
> As mentioned, you can find the add-on thread here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51037](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51037)
> 
> The criticism and bad attitude displayed here is usually a pretty small minority of users, so first let me say I'm sorry this gets to be your first experience, and secondly don't hesitate to bring questions when you have them.

Yeah, I apologize if how I posted my answer a little too rudely. Kind of a bit hard to get exact intentions out in words. But I DO intend for the answer to be there! He has not given up on the mod and it is currently being updated. The reason it wasn't updated between .25 and .90 was simply because it didn't really NEED to be updated for it to function correctly

> 
> Yeah, I apologize if how I posted my answer a little too rudely. Kind of a bit hard to get exact intentions out in words. But I DO intend for the answer to be there! He has not given up on the mod and it is currently being updated. The reason it wasn't updated between .25 and .90 was simply because it didn't really NEED to be updated for it to function correctly

Wasn't at all referring to you.

\*\*Forum Police Disclaimer - I hereby attest, under penalty of purjory, that the exact contents of my reply, including my signature and choice of words as reflecting my unique cognitive presence in the universe, did not appear in a search as I had not yet written it.\*\*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

two weeks is what i heard. so i'm trying Nova Punch for now.

Seriously? Seriously?

There is a report button for a reason people. What a way to welcome a new user to the forums - insulting him for not trawling through hundreds of pages of posts looking for [a short post by the author](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/51037-0-25-KW-Rocketry-v2-6d2-Available-0-25-Compatibility!-16-10-2014?p=1863858&viewfull=1#post1863858) that was immediately buried, and making a trivial mistake in the placement of his thread. Then you started insulting each other.

If you think something should be moved, *inform a moderator*. We're here for a reason, guys.

Locked and punted to General Add-on Affairs. 

We can do better than this.
